name: Optimistic
description: A hopeful, positive emotional atmosphere that emphasizes the bright side of situations and maintains faith in positive outcomes.
emotionalImpact: Inspires hope, confidence, and positive expectations in audiences. Creates feelings of possibility and encouragement.

visualElements.colorAssociations: Bright, warm colors - yellows, light blues, soft greens, golden tones
visualElements.lightingStyle: Bright, natural lighting with soft shadows. Golden hour and warm illumination
visualElements.compositionStyle: Open, expansive compositions with upward movement and bright focal points

audioElements.musicStyle: Major keys, uplifting melodies, bright instrumentation, moderate to fast tempos
audioElements.soundDesign: Clear, pleasant sounds - birds singing, gentle breezes, positive ambient sounds

name: Melancholic
description: A bittersweet, contemplative emotional atmosphere that combines sadness with beauty, often nostalgic or wistful in nature.
emotionalImpact: Evokes thoughtful sadness, nostalgia, and emotional depth. Creates space for reflection and empathy.

visualElements.colorAssociations: Muted colors - soft grays, pale blues, faded pastels, autumn tones
visualElements.lightingStyle: Soft, diffused lighting with gentle shadows. Overcast or twilight atmospheres
visualElements.compositionStyle: Contemplative framing with empty spaces, distant subjects, reflective surfaces

audioElements.musicStyle: Minor keys, slow tempos, string instruments, piano, gentle and flowing melodies
audioElements.soundDesign: Subtle, atmospheric sounds - distant rain, wind through trees, quiet spaces

name: Tense
description: A high-stress emotional atmosphere characterized by anxiety, anticipation, and nervous energy that keeps audiences on edge.
emotionalImpact: Creates anxiety, anticipation, and nervous energy. Keeps audiences engaged through psychological pressure.

visualElements.colorAssociations: Sharp contrasts, cool blues, stark whites, deep shadows, unsettling color combinations
visualElements.lightingStyle: Harsh, directional lighting with strong shadows. Flickering or unstable light sources
visualElements.compositionStyle: Tight framing, unusual angles, claustrophobic spaces, off-balance compositions

audioElements.musicStyle: Dissonant harmonies, irregular rhythms, building crescendos, sudden stops and starts
audioElements.soundDesign: Unsettling sounds - creaking, footsteps, sudden noises, uncomfortable silence

name: Whimsical
description: A playful, imaginative emotional atmosphere that embraces the fantastical, quirky, and delightfully unexpected.
emotionalImpact: Sparks imagination, joy, and childlike wonder. Creates delight through unexpected and creative elements.

visualElements.colorAssociations: Bright, saturated colors - rainbow palettes, pastels, unexpected color combinations
visualElements.lightingStyle: Playful, colorful lighting with creative shadows and magical quality
visualElements.compositionStyle: Creative, unusual framing with fantastical elements and imaginative perspectives

audioElements.musicStyle: Playful melodies, unusual instruments, creative arrangements, light and bouncy rhythms
audioElements.soundDesign: Creative, fantastical sounds - magical effects, playful noises, imaginative audio

name: Gritty
description: A raw, unpolished emotional atmosphere that emphasizes harsh realities, urban decay, and unvarnished truth.
emotionalImpact: Creates sense of realism, toughness, and authenticity. Emphasizes harsh truths and difficult realities.

visualElements.colorAssociations: Desaturated colors, browns, grays, rust tones, dirty and weathered palettes
visualElements.lightingStyle: Harsh, unflattering lighting with deep shadows and high contrast
visualElements.compositionStyle: Raw, documentary-style framing with handheld camera feel and realistic angles

audioElements.musicStyle: Raw, unpolished sounds, industrial elements, heavy bass, aggressive rhythms
audioElements.soundDesign: Urban sounds - traffic, machinery, harsh environmental noise, realistic audio

name: Ethereal
description: A dreamlike, otherworldly emotional atmosphere that feels light, spiritual, and transcendent of ordinary reality.
emotionalImpact: Creates sense of wonder, spirituality, and transcendence. Evokes feelings of being transported beyond the ordinary.

visualElements.colorAssociations: Soft, luminous colors - whites, pale golds, soft blues, translucent tones
visualElements.lightingStyle: Soft, diffused lighting with glowing effects and heavenly illumination
visualElements.compositionStyle: Floating, weightless compositions with soft focus and dreamy perspectives

audioElements.musicStyle: Ambient, atmospheric music with reverb, soft synthesizers, celestial sounds
audioElements.soundDesign: Soft, atmospheric sounds - gentle winds, distant echoes, peaceful ambience

name: Energetic
description: A high-energy, dynamic emotional atmosphere characterized by movement, excitement, and vibrant activity.
emotionalImpact: Generates excitement, motivation, and physical energy. Creates sense of movement and dynamic action.

visualElements.colorAssociations: Vibrant, saturated colors - bright reds, electric blues, neon tones, high contrast
visualElements.lightingStyle: Dynamic, changing lighting with strong contrasts and energetic movement
visualElements.compositionStyle: Dynamic framing with movement, quick cuts, energetic camera work

audioElements.musicStyle: Fast tempos, driving rhythms, energetic instrumentation, upbeat melodies
audioElements.soundDesign: Dynamic sounds - movement, activity, energetic environmental audio

name: Contemplative
description: A thoughtful, introspective emotional atmosphere that encourages deep thinking, reflection, and philosophical consideration.
emotionalImpact: Encourages reflection, deep thinking, and philosophical engagement. Creates space for internal dialogue.

visualElements.colorAssociations: Muted, sophisticated colors - earth tones, deep blues, soft grays, natural palettes
visualElements.lightingStyle: Soft, natural lighting that creates peaceful, thoughtful atmosphere
visualElements.compositionStyle: Balanced, symmetrical compositions with space for reflection and contemplation

audioElements.musicStyle: Slow, meditative music with space between notes, classical or ambient styles
audioElements.soundDesign: Quiet, peaceful sounds - nature sounds, gentle ambience, thoughtful silence
